docs.text: Monarch API monarch-api is a FastAPI for browsing the knowledge graph produced by the Monarch Initiative. API Reference Data Response Model For developers You can install monarch-api from GitHub as follows: # clone the repo git clone https://github.com/monarch-initiative/monarch-app # cd into the folder cd monarch-app # install poetry install
docs.title: Monarch API

docs.text: Association Endpoints _get_all_associations async Retrieves all associations for a given entity, or between two entities Parameters: Name Type Description Default pagination PaginationParams description . Defaults to Depends(). Depends() category str description . Defaults to None. None predicate str description . Defaults to None. None subject str description . Defaults to None. None object str description . Defaults to None. None entity str description . Defaults to None. None between str A comma separated pair of entites associated in either direction. None association_type str An association type from AssociationTypeEnum in the model. Defaults to None. None Returns: Name Type Description AssociationResults AssociationResults description _get_association_between async Retrieves all associations from an object to a subject Parameters: Name Type Description Default subject str description required object str description required pagination PaginationParams description . Defaults to Depends(). Depends() Returns: Name Type Description AssociationResults AssociationResults description _get_association_from async Retrieves all associations from an entity as the object Parameters: Name Type Description Default object str description required pagination PaginationParams description . Defaults to Depends(). Depends() Returns: Name Type Description _type_ description _get_association_to async Retrieves all associations to an entity as the subject Parameters: Name Type Description Default subject str description required pagination PaginationParams description . Defaults to Depends(). Depends() Returns: Name Type Description AssociationResults AssociationResults description
docs.title: Association Endpoints

docs.text: Entity Endpoints _association_table Retrieves association table data for a given entity and association type Parameters: Name Type Description Default id str ID of the entity to retrieve association table data, ex: MONDO:0019391 Query(Ellipsis, example='MONDO:0019391', title='ID of the entity to retrieve association table data for') category str Category of association to retrieve association table data for, ex: biolink:DiseaseToPhenotypicFeatureAssociation Query(Ellipsis, example='biolink:DiseaseToPhenotypicFeatureAssociation', title='Type of association to retrieve association table data for') query str Query string to limit results to a subset. Defaults to None. Query(None, example='thumb', title='Query string to limit results to a subset') Returns: Name Type Description AssociationResults AssociationTableResults Association table data for the specified entity and association type _get_entity async Retrieves the entity with the specified id Parameters: Name Type Description Default id str ID for the entity to retrieve, ex: MONDO:0019391 Query(Ellipsis, description='ID for the entity to retrieve, ex: MONDO:0019391', example='MONDO:0019391') Raises: Type Description HTTPException 404 if the entity is not found Returns: Name Type Description Node Node Entity details for the specified id
